name: Infinite Procedurally Generated Terrain (Unity3D WebGL)
description:
https://twitter.com/hey_sup_m8

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Left-Click: Lock cursor into window.

R = Reload level

+ = Move faster (can hold down)

- = Move slower (can hold down)

This was made with Unity3D in C#. It procedurally generates terrain for as long as there is enough memory to do so.
